alert.note: Alert for Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:58PM EDT until July 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Colleton County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Hall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Hendersonville, Ashepoo, Green Pond, Ritter and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 44 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
